            <gmd:abstract>
                <gco:CharacterString>The St. Croix watershed faces unique environmental and socioeconomic challenges as well as an international border.
In the past there have been sewage and industry spills within the watershed; Water quality throughout the watershed was highly deteriorated from heavy industry, municipal sewage, and other contaminants. Since the EPA's clean water act, and other effective government regulations, water quality has improved tremendously.  In 2017, the Saint Croix International Waterway Commission (SCIWC) began to effectively monitor water quality throughout the St. Croix watershed. Regular water quality monitoring will allow for a timely detection of contaminants, measurable comparisons of historical to current water quality, and will contribute to longstanding data records.</gco:CharacterString>
            </gmd:abstract>

keywords_translation_method.fr: Keyword text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate

name: 10-25976-cxjd-ez84
notes:
The St. Croix watershed faces unique environmental and socioeconomic challenges as well as an international border.
In the past there have been sewage and industry spills within the watershed; Water quality throughout the watershed was highly deteriorated from heavy industry, municipal sewage, and other contaminants. Since the EPA's clean water act, and other effective government regulations, water quality has improved tremendously.  In 2017, the Saint Croix International Waterway Commission (SCIWC) began to effectively monitor water quality throughout the St. Croix watershed. Regular water quality monitoring will allow for a timely detection of contaminants, measurable comparisons of historical to current water quality, and will contribute to longstanding data records.

notes_translated.en:
The St. Croix watershed faces unique environmental and socioeconomic challenges as well as an international border.
In the past there have been sewage and industry spills within the watershed; Water quality throughout the watershed was highly deteriorated from heavy industry, municipal sewage, and other contaminants. Since the EPA's clean water act, and other effective government regulations, water quality has improved tremendously.  In 2017, the Saint Croix International Waterway Commission (SCIWC) began to effectively monitor water quality throughout the St. Croix watershed. Regular water quality monitoring will allow for a timely detection of contaminants, measurable comparisons of historical to current water quality, and will contribute to longstanding data records.
notes_translated.fr:
Le bassin versant de Sainte-Croix est confronté à des défis environnementaux et socio-économiques uniques ainsi qu'à une frontière internationale.
Dans le passé, il y a eu des déversements d'eaux usées et industriels dans le bassin versant ; la qualité de l'eau dans tout le bassin versant s'est fortement détériorée en raison de l'industrie lourde, des eaux usées municipales et d'autres contaminants. Depuis la loi sur l'eau potable de l'EPA et d'autres réglementations gouvernementales efficaces, la qualité de l'eau s'est considérablement améliorée. En 2017, la Commission de la voie navigable internationale de Sainte-Croix (SCIWC) a commencé à surveiller efficacement la qualité de l'eau dans l'ensemble du bassin versant de Sainte-Croix. La surveillance régulière de la qualité de l'eau permettra de détecter en temps opportun les contaminants, de comparer de manière mesurable la qualité historique de l'eau à la qualité actuelle de l'eau, et contribuera à l'enregistrement de données de longue date.

notes_translation_method.fr: Description text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate

description_translated.en: DataStream is an open access platform for sharing water and sediment quality data.
description_translated.fr: DataStream est une plateforme en libre accès pour partager des données sur la qualité de l'eau et des sédiments.

title: St. Croix International Waterway Commission

title_translated.fr: Commission de la voie navigable internationale de Sainte-Croix
